title: Dragon Radar FacePak
description: ##***ATTENTION***##This face requires Face for WearCan be downloaded here -> https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face&hl=en_____________________Time to start hunting dragon balls with this dragon radar analog clock face.Features smooth second hand
descriptionHTML:
##***ATTENTION***##
This face requires Face for Wear
Can be downloaded here -> https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face&hl=en
_____________________

Time to start hunting dragon balls with this dragon radar analog clock face.

Features smooth second hand
comments: Whut? Me no understand this app. I doesnt show up on my tablet. Plz help.

I love it, I only wish it had support for square watches,  like lg g watch,  please update and I'll change to 5 stars,  thank you!!!  Keep up the good work.
